00001 package com.placesandplaces;
00002 
00003 //code taken from: http://wptrafficanalyzer.in/blog/showing-nearby-places-with-photos-at-any-location-in-google-maps-android-api-v2/
00004 
00005 
00006 import org.json.JSONArray;
00007 import org.json.JSONException;
00008 import org.json.JSONObject;
00009  
00010 import android.util.Log;
00011  
00012 public class PlaceJSONParser {
00013  
00015     public PlaceParcel[] parse(JSONObject jObject){
00016  
00017         JSONArray jPlaces = null;
00018         try {
00020             jPlaces = jObject.getJSONArray("results");
00021         } catch (JSONException e) {
00022             e.printStackTrace();
00023         }
00027         return getPlaces(jPlaces);
00028     }
00029  
00030     private PlaceParcel[] getPlaces(JSONArray jPlaces){
00031         int placesCount = jPlaces.length();
00032         PlaceParcel[] places = new PlaceParcel[placesCount];
00033  
00035         for(int i=0; i<placesCount;i++){
00036             try {
00038                 places[i] = getPlace((JSONObject)jPlaces.get(i));
00039  
00040             } catch (JSONException e) {
00041                 e.printStackTrace();
00042             }
00043         }
00044         return places;
00045     }
00046  
00048     private PlaceParcel getPlace(JSONObject jPlace){
00049  
00050         PlaceParcel place = new PlaceParcel();
00051  
00052         try {
00053             // Extracting Place name, if available
00054             if(!jPlace.isNull("name")){
00055                 place.mPlaceName = jPlace.getString("name");
00056             }
00057  
00058             // Extracting Place Vicinity, if available
00059             if(!jPlace.isNull("vicinity")){
00060                 place.mVicinity = jPlace.getString("vicinity");
00061             }
00062  
00063             if(!jPlace.isNull("photos")){
00064                 JSONArray photos = jPlace.getJSONArray("photos");
00065                 place.mPhotos = new PlacePhoto[photos.length()];
00066                 for(int i=0;i<photos.length();i++){
00067                     place.mPhotos[i] = new PlacePhoto();
00068                     place.mPhotos[i].mWidth = ((JSONObject)photos.get(i)).getInt("width");
00069                     place.mPhotos[i].mHeight = ((JSONObject)photos.get(i)).getInt("height");
00070                     place.mPhotos[i].mPhotoReference = ((JSONObject)photos.get(i)).getString("photo_reference");
00071                     JSONArray attributions = ((JSONObject)photos.get(i)).getJSONArray("html_attributions");
00072                     place.mPhotos[i].mAttributions = new Attribution[attributions.length()];
00073                     for(int j=0;j<attributions.length();j++){
00074                         place.mPhotos[i].mAttributions[j] = new Attribution();
00075                         place.mPhotos[i].mAttributions[j].mHtmlAttribution = attributions.getString(j);
00076                     }
00077                 }
00078             }
00079  
00080             place.mLat = jPlace.getJSONObject("geometry").getJSONObject("location").getString("lat");
00081             place.mLng = jPlace.getJSONObject("geometry").getJSONObject("location").getString("lng");
00082  
00083         } catch (JSONException e) {
00084             e.printStackTrace();
00085             Log.d("EXCEPTION", e.toString());
00086         }
00087         return place;
00088     }
00089 }
